definitions.example: The transport of goods is not included in the price given on the website.

definitions.definition: The state of being transported by emotion; rapture.
A vehicle used to transport (passengers, mail, freight, troops etc.)
The system of transporting passengers, etc. in a particular region; the vehicles used in such a system.
definitions.example: The local transport received a big boost as part of the mayor's infrastructural plans.

definitions.definition: A device that moves recording tape across the read/write heads of a tape recorder or video recorder etc.
To carry or bear from one place to another; to remove; to convey.
definitions.example: to transport goods; to transport troops

definitions.definition: To deport to a penal colony.
To move (someone) to strong emotion; to carry away.
